name: Cris Cros Plays
description:
Cris Cros is a streamer on the Tuitch platform. 

His favorite game is No More Chileee, a bullet hell shooter. 

His dream is to get over 1,000,000 viewers!

====

This game was made in 1 week for a game jam
This Is Chile Jam
https://itch.io/jam/this-is-chile

====

Assets

Utils

Dotween: http://dotween.demigiant.com/

Audio

Ultimate SFX & Music Bundle - Everything Bundle:  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/ultimate-sfx-music-bundle-e...

Font

Font - Suplexmentary Comic: https://www.dafont.com/suplexmentary-comic-nc.font

Font - i pixel u: https://www.dafont.com/es/i-pixel-u.font
